modules.description: This module provides operations to control and query the Spotify media player over the MPRIS D-Bus interface. It includes functions to quit and raise the player window, check capabilities like track list support, and retrieve metadata such as identity and supported URI schemes. Concrete use cases include integrating Spotify into custom media control interfaces and querying player capabilities for dynamic UI updates.

Creates a D-Bus proxy object for interacting with the Banshee media player. Works with `OBus_proxy.t` and Lwt promises. Useful for controlling Banshee playback or querying track information over D-Bus.

Creates an OBus proxy object for interacting with a MPRIS-compliant media player, specifically Mopidy, over D-Bus. Works with `OBus_proxy.t` and leverages Lwt for asynchronous operations. Useful for controlling media playback or querying player state from OCaml applications.

Creates an OBus proxy for a given D-Bus service name, enabling interaction with MPRIS-compliant media players. Works with strings and OBus_proxy.t values. Useful for building clients that control media playback through D-Bus interfaces.

This module provides operations to control and query the Spotify media player over the MPRIS D-Bus interface. It includes functions to quit and raise the player window, check capabilities like track list support, and retrieve metadata such as identity and supported URI schemes. Concrete use cases include integrating Spotify into custom media control interfaces and querying player capabilities for dynamic UI updates.
